unless advised by your doctor.
Threadworms Pharmacists cannot supply 
threadworm medicines to 
pregnant women without  
a prescription. 
On your doctor’s advice: mebendazole, 
but preferably not in the 1st trimester.
Vaginal thrush Pharmacists cannot supply 
medicines for vaginal thrush  
to pregnant women without  
a prescription. 
On your doctor’s advice: clotrimazole 
pessaries or cream. Do not use the pessary 
applicator if you are near term (at the end  
of your pregnancy).
Fluconazol
